Name: Really Trash Game
About the game: This shoot`em`up game will be a decent challenge for you. Go through pack of levels, grabbing weapons, and shooting your way through them. The ammo is scarce, enemies is everywhere, and surrounding vehicles needs just a little sparks to blown up, killing you and all who will be near. Features: * Classic gameplay. * Swarm of enemies. * Destroyable vehicles. * Scarce ammo, so be careful recharging your weapons. * Stylish lo-poly graphics. * Dynamic music. * 9 levels.
